column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Say whatever about the beer...it washed down some great pizza.  I was starving and these pies surely hit the spot.  The butter crust was amazing and the pizza was well worth the wait (we waited about 20-30 minutes for the two of us
column2: but then again on St. Patty's Day in mid afternoon during March Madness
column3: I'd say it was pretty good
column4: because the line was way longer when we left).  I could see why it was the "original" and one of the hottest venues to come for the deep dish pizza.
